page.title: Help & FAQ
page.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about using {appName}
page.noResultsDescription: Try using different keywords or browse the categories below.

quickLinks.gettingStartedDesc: Learn how to use the service

howToStart.question: How do I start using {appName}?
howToStart.answerStep3: You'll receive 10 free credits to try the service
howToStart.answerStep6: Use your credits to try the API
howToStart.answerStep7: Choose a plan that fits your needs

supportedFormats.question: What data formats are supported?
supportedFormats.answerIntro: Our API supports JSON for requests and responses:
supportedFormats.maxFileSize: Maximum request size for free tier:

apiUsage.question: How do I use the API?
apiUsage.answerDetail3: Credits are deducted for each request
apiUsage.example: Example: Check the documentation for specific endpoint details and request/response formats.

processingTime.question: How long does processing take?
processingTime.answer: Processing typically takes a few seconds depending on the operation and current server load. You'll receive a response with your results.

whatAreCredits.question: What are credits?
whatAreCredits.answerPart1: Credits are the currency used for API requests. Each API call consumes credits based on the operation.

purchaseCredits.question: How do I purchase more credits?
purchaseCredits.answerMid: to choose from our subscription plans:

creditsExpire.question: Do credits expire?
creditsExpire.answer: Subscription credits roll over month-to-month up to 6× your monthly credit allowance, as long as your subscription remains active. For example, the Hobby plan can accumulate up to 1,200 credits (6 × 200).

cancelSubscription.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancelSubscription.answerIntro: Yes! You can cancel anytime through:
cancelSubscription.answerOutro: You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period, and any remaining credits will stay in your account.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and various other payment methods through Stripe, our secure payment processor.

refunds.question: Can I get a refund?
refunds.answerIntro: Due to the nature of digital services, refunds are generally not provided for used credits. However, we may issue refunds at our discretion for:
refunds.reason1: Technical failures that result in lost credits

failedProcessing.question: My API request failed. What should I do?
failedProcessing.step1: Your credit should be automatically refunded if the error was on our end
failedProcessing.step2: Check that your request meets our API requirements (format, size)
failedProcessing.step3: Review the error message for details

qualityIssues.question: The result isn't what I expected.
qualityIssues.answerIntro: API results depend on the operation and input data:
qualityIssues.result1: Review the API documentation for expected behavior
qualityIssues.result2: Check that your input data is properly formatted
qualityIssues.result3: Verify you're using the correct endpoint and parameters
qualityIssues.answerOutro: The quality of your input data greatly affects the final result. Starting with clean, well-formatted data will produce better results.

dataPrivacy.question: Is my data secure and private?
dataPrivacy.point1: Data is processed securely and not stored longer than necessary
dataPrivacy.point2: We do not use your data to train models
dataPrivacy.point3: All data transmission is encrypted with HTTPS
dataPrivacy.point4: We comply with data protection regulations

commercialUse.question: Can I use the API results commercially?
commercialUse.answer: Yes! You retain all rights to your data. We do not claim any ownership of the data you process through our API. However, you must have the legal right to use the input data you provide. We are not responsible for copyright violations related to your source data.

browserSupport.question: What browsers are supported?
browserSupport.answerIntro: Our dashboard works best on modern browsers:
browserSupport.jsNote: JavaScript must be enabled for the dashboard to function.

cta.title: Still need help?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
